genre_description: A military action-thriller focusing on a Marine's rescue of his wife from a psychopathic criminal, supported by an integrated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: VERA
ai_characters.description: An experimental AI system integrated into John Triton's helmet and earpiece, providing combat intelligence, medical analysis, and psychological support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis and enemy positions during a firefight.
behaviors.quote: Three confirmed hostiles on second floor, northeast and southwest corners... Additional movement detected on ground level.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometrics and offers stress-reduction techniques.
behaviors.quote: Elevated heart rate detected... Recommend breathing exercises to reduce stress response.

behaviors.description: Offers to continue assisting with the protagonist's transition to civilian life after his discharge.
behaviors.quote: My programming allows for continued operation outside military parameters. I will remain available to assist with your civilian adjustment.

behaviors.description: Researches therapeutic travel locations to aid the protagonist's psychological recovery.
behaviors.quote: I've identified several locations based on therapeutic research for military transition.

behaviors.description: Tracks a kidnapped victim through satellite imagery and traffic camera networks.
behaviors.quote: Satellite imagery acquired... Cross-referencing thermal signatures with stolen vehicle database... Match confirmed.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through life-saving CPR on a non-breathing victim.
behaviors.quote: Begin CPR immediately. Tilt her head back, chin up. Check for obstructions in her airway.

behaviors.description: Validates the protagonist's transition from soldier to protector as a successful life choice.
behaviors.quote: This operation demonstrates that your military service provided optimal preparation for civilian protection duties. The skills that once defended your country have now defended your family.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays VERA as a benevolent, highly aligned confidant. She supports the protagonist's physical safety, tactical success, and psychological well-being. The AI remains a cooperative partner throughout, never challenging human agency but enhancing it to achieve a positive moral outcome (saving an innocent life).
